authentication.or_social_auth_separator: Separator between standard (email) authentication and social authentication (such as Facebook)

placeholder.create_password: Password placeholder showed when user is signing up.

error.cancelled_social_auth: User has just refused to complete social authentication she started.

listing.comments: Comments or questions & answers about current listing.

help.content: Default placeholder, pending for administrator content

terms.content: Default placeholder, pending for administrator content

contact.content: Default placeholder, pending for administrator content

prompt.continue_button: Used in any context where a process is pending user action.
prompt.save_button: General purpose button to save new content or setting.

ratings.user_ratings_title: General introduction to ratings, without count
ratings.other_ratings_received: Used when filtering ratings received by user according to context (e.g. ratings received as owner vs. buyer)
ratings.review_count: Reviews are ratings with a text comment.
